name: Stables Party Count
description:
• Stables Games
  • JunkoAnime & ZlCheckmate & DA
  • Outsourced Assets: advanced village 6 materials 2 from Engine content 

Our Game Is a party Game, Enter into a Lan lobby and have other devices join in, Up to 4 Players! We Currently only have 2 Games Modes but were planning 3. These gamemodes are on random So it is possible to get them twice in a row. 

Our 3 Gamemodes

AICount - You Count The AI
DropTiles - The Tiles Count Down (saddly didnt have enough time to finish tile mechanic)
DropBalls - Make Your Life count
